name: Metal & Linen Lounge Chair - Ecru
description: The Metal and Linen Lounge Chair - Ecru is the ideal modern accent chair. Delight in cloud-like comfort when luxuriating in this chair. Featuring a contrasting matte black metal frame and Ecru linen cushions. The soft feather filled linen cushions drape effortlessly over the metal arms. To be used indoors. Each cushion features a hidden zip to allow for the convenient removal of covers. Also available in Chocolate.
